name: CardCamp
description:
Game made in 48h for the Ludum Dare #36 - Ancient Technology.

It's a single player card game, I was inspire by apps like Tinder and the game Reigns. I don't know if I will continued this project but I think he has a lot of potential.

The goal is to arrive in the Middle Age without having a stat at 0%. Your stats are "Money", "Social" and "Army". Each stat has its color code, army -> red, social -> blue and money -> green. The last stat is the "Techno", when this stat is at 100%, you need to finish the round and after you can choose a new technology. Each technology get a bonus to its speciality. For example, if you choose "writing", you have a bonus of 1% for each choice corresponding of the technology.

The game is written in Java, I use Inkscape for the graphisms (except the font, I use Gimp). The music was made with Bosca Ceoil and the game engine was written from Scratch.

So enjoy and Good Luck ;).
